last_episode_to_air.name: Life will not tell you where the destination is.
last_episode_to_air.overview: When the truth comes out, Yeon-u takes responsibility for his actions. But he has one more card left to play in a bid to protect Gang-seok and the firm.

name: Suits
overview: Choi Kyung Seo is a legendary lawyer at the top law firm in South Korea. He has charisma and an attractive appearance. He hires Go Yeon Woo as a rookie lawyer for the law firm. Go Yeon Woo has excellent memory.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A renowned corporate attorney at a prestigious firm gambles on a dropout with a photographic memory but no law degree to help on high-stakes cases.

episodes.name: What determines the destiny is not a chance, but a choice.
episodes.overview: A struggling young man heads to a hotel to run a shady errand -- and stumbles into a job interview with an eminent attorney forced to hire a protégé.

episodes.name: If you get a chance to cast the dice, just do it. Once you do it, you get at least one step forward.
episodes.overview: Park Myeong-hwan files a lawsuit against Choi Gang-seok. Go Yeon-u is assigned a pro bono sexual harassment and wrongful termination case.

episodes.name: There is always a dark side behind the mask of truth. And that is why...
episodes.overview: Yeon-u sets out to make things right on two fronts: the hostage situation he put Cheol-sun in, and the damage he caused to the sexual harassment case.

episodes.name: Just because the truth is coming out, it does not necessary mean that you will win.
episodes.overview: A divorce case reunites Gang-seok with an old flame. Blackmailed by Chae Geun-sik, Yeon-u must convince a hip-hop artist to become a Kang & Ham client.

episodes.name: To capture a hyena, carrion has to be used as bait.
episodes.overview: A class-action suit's defense lawyer challenges Gang-seok to a duel in court. In Kang & Ham's mock trial, Yeon-u is pitted against a three-time champ.

episodes.name: Is a sheath truly unnecessary for a knife called justice?
episodes.overview: Yeon-u suspects Gang-seok is hiding something from his past and investigates, and later helps an accountant accused of forging his academic credentials.

episodes.name: Justice is giving back everyone what they rightfully deserve.
episodes.overview: Gang-seok is torn between his loyalty toward his mentor and protecting himself. Yeon-u notices an oddity on Kang & Ham paystubs processed by Namyoung.

episodes.name: You can't go back in time and start over again, but you can still aim for a new ending starting from now.
episodes.overview: Gang-seok defends a man he wrongfully imprisoned as a public prosecutor. Painful memories surface when Yeon-u is assigned to a hit-and-run case.

episodes.name: You can prove your worth by showing the kind of risk you are willing to take.
episodes.overview: Gang-seok tries to prove his theory on who actually murdered Kim Min-ju. Yeon-u learns a detail that Park Jun-gyu failed to mention before.

episodes.name: If you wish to swallow a demon, you must swallow its horns too.
episodes.overview: Rumors of Ham Gi-taek's imminent return rattle Kang & Ham's staff. Yeon-u gets his first solo case: a young woman claiming her book idea was stolen.

episodes.name: If you have blind faith about your ideals, you'll be betrayed by the reality.
episodes.overview: Gang-seok tries to end a nurses strike at Haram Sanatorium, but when Gi-taek interferes, Yeon-u gets caught in the middle of their power struggle.

episodes.name: The moment you fly up with wings called lies, you will not be landing.
episodes.overview: A lawsuit against a car manufacturer over a fatal accident reunites Gang-seok with David Kim. Yeon-u introduces Kim Ji-na to his grandmother.

episodes.name: The best way to keep a secret is not telling it to anyone.
episodes.overview: When David Kim offers to settle out of court if Gang-seok is disbarred, Yeon-u gives Ha-yeon an idea to measure Gang-seok's chances of winning in court.

episodes.name: When you lose your destination, look back on the path that you've walked thus far.
episodes.overview: Kang & Ham's partners vote on whether to allow the case against Gang-seok to go to trial. But first, Yeon-u presents testimony he gathered from CEO Seo.

episodes.name: Life will not tell you where the destination is.
episodes.overview: When the truth comes out, Yeon-u takes responsibility for his actions. But he has one more card left to play in a bid to protect Gang-seok and the firm.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A renowned corporate attorney at a prestigious firm gambles on a dropout with a photographic memory but no law degree to help on high-stakes cases.
